org.sd.cio.mapreduce
Class Reducer<K,V,A,R>

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cio.mapreduce.MapReduceBase<K,V,A,R>
      org.sd.cio.mapreduce.Reducer<K,V,A,R>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Governable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RepeatingReducer
public abstract class Reducer<K,V,A,R>
extends MapReduceBase<K,V,A,R>

Reduce process definition utility.

In addtion to the abstract methods from MapReduceBase for specifying the processing input and output, extenders of this class must implement the following:

  • getRootOutputFile -- to specify the root output directory.
  • buildMultiPartRecordFactory -- to specify groups of files over which to co-iterate.
  • getCoIterator -- to co-iterate over a file group.
  • buildRecordComparer -- for sorting and collecting like records for reduction.
  • buildOutputFinalizer -- for finalizing each output file when filled.
  • reduce -- to do the actual work of reducing equal pairs into one.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Build a factory for specifying and collecting groups of files over which to co-iterate.

the MultiPartRecordFactory for grouping files.

getCoIterator

protected abstract MultiFileIterator<KVPair<K,V>> getCoIterator(java.util.List<java.io.File> files,
                                                                java.util.Comparator<KVPair<K,V>> recordComparer)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
Get a co-iterator over the key/value pairs from the files in a group of files as returned from the multi-part record factory.

Parameters:
files - The group of files over which to co-iterate.
recordComparer - The comparator for sorting and collecting pairs.
Returns:
a MultiFileIterator for the files.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Build an output finalizer for finalizing each output file when filled.

reduce

protected abstract MapperPair<K,V,A> reduce(java.util.List<KVPair<K,V>> pairs,
                                            java.util.List<java.io.File> context)
Do the work of reducing the pairs into one pair that can be correlated to the appropriate flush action through its action key.

Parameters:
pairs - A set of equal pairs (according to the record comparator) to be combined.
context - The group of files from which the pairs were collected.
Returns:
a single combined pair.

simpleTextFileCoIterator

protected final MultiFileIterator<KVPair<K,V>> simpleTextFileCoIterator(java.util.List<java.io.File> files,
                                                                        java.util.Comparator<KVPair<K,V>> recordComparer,
                                                                        KVPairLoader<K,V,java.lang.String> kvPairLoader)
                                                                 throws java.io.IOException
Utility method for extenders to call while implementing getCoIterator.

This is appropriate for cases where the input file contains key/value pairs in a text file, one pair per line.

Parameters:
files - The list of files over which to co-iterate.
recordComparer - The comparator for sorting and combining like pairs.
kvPairLoader - A strategy for transforming a file line into a mapper key/value pair.
Returns:
the MultiFileIterator over the files.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

buildSimpleFileCollector

protected final SimpleFileCollector buildSimpleFileCollector(java.lang.Integer maxFiles)
Utility method for extenders to call while implementing buildFileCollector.

This is appropriate for cases where files to co-iterate are grouped under a common parent.

Parameters:
maxFiles - The maximum number of files to collect in a group.
Returns:
a SimpleFileCollector instance.
